game.name: ZeroOne Terminal
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 터치 전용 옵션, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Predict which startups win by investing in 20 years of tech history. Interrogate founders, apply Zero to One principles, and see if you can spot the next Google or Airbnb.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Predict which startups win by investing in 20 years of tech history. Interrogate founders, apply Zero to One principles, and see if you can spot the next Google or Airbnb.
